Description:
Detects potential DLL sideloading of Python DLL files.

Author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Python DLL SideLoading
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((image_loaded like '%\python39.dll' or image_loaded like '%\python310.dll' or image_loaded like '%\python311.dll' or image_loaded like '%\python312.dll') and  not ((product = 'python' and signed = 'true' and description = 'python' and company = 'python software foundation') or ((image_loaded like 'c:\program files\python3%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\python3%') and image_loaded like '%\appdata\local\programs\python\python3%')) and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\microsoft visual studio\%' or (image_loaded like '%\cpython\externals\%' or image_loaded like '%\cpython\pcbuild\%')))
